title: I've been trying to climb...

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
I started to go at ranked pretty hard about a week or 2 ago when school ended. I usually have a positive KDA pretty good map awareness and my pings are pretty good.  Most of the time i win lane and its other lanes that do poorly. I can help this out when im jungle because i can apply pressure for them but most of the time i get top. I'm just wondering is there an easier way to climb out of bronze? I know you're going to have loses here and there... Anyway advice would be cool and i wouldn't mind queueing with people if anyone is looking for that. 
Sincerely, 
Brosiden Lord of the Brocean

replies.body:
You have pretty good stats all things considered.  Your olaf has  a 59% win ratio which is pretty damn good.  Especially managing to keep it that high over that many games.  You seem to have lost your last 3 ranked games though, don't worry about that, the 60 or so lp may look like a huge fall but its really not that bad.  Keep playing and judging by your stats you should be out of bronze with some time.

On tips for climbing in general, main 1-3 champs and master them. For me its darius, renekton and jax.  Look up guides, learn all of their match ups etc.  You already seem to do that with Olaf so grab someone else who you like in case olaf gets banned or picked.

Look up phylol and a couple other youtubers who release videos for climbing.

Other than that just focus on the basics.  Always assume the jungler is in the bush, keep farm up, group early if you have an advantage.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tRH6WjrA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-13T22:14:55.520+0000)

Keep playing and judging by your stats you should be out of bronze with some time.

> On tips for climbing in general, main 1-3 champs and master them. For me its darius, renekton and jax.  Look up guides, learn all of their match ups etc.  You already seem to do that with Olaf so grab someone else who you like in case olaf gets banned or picked.
> 
> Look up phylol and a couple other youtubers who release videos for climbing.
> 
> Other than that just focus on the basics.  Always assume the jungler is in the bush, keep farm up, group early if you have an advantage.

thanks for the tips would you mind friending me to watch some of my games maybe?

OLAF game 2-4-1 TOP 
I suppose you were facing a Vi and Graves top, but the Black cleaver was Ok buy for olaf but being the enemy team had Graves, Cait, Liss, Vi and Soraka The black Cleaver was not that great of a buy tbh.  Your team were  Blitz- Fizz- Kal-and Jax.  You needed to be the tank of the team and you had 0 tank items.  
  You were building a ruby crystal and a war hammer that builds into nothing together so you were mixed about more DMG or Tank.  
  The corrupting potion was an ok item but I would recommend getting Cloth armor if you was facing AD top in that game. 

   The order that I would have bought 
{{item:1029}}   Against Graves early will not do much but against the vi it helps, she has armor pen Ability but its better against her.  
The Corrupting potion like I said before was OK but not first item as the Graves and Vi can both dash away from you and the proc Dmg from it will be useless.  {{item:2033}}   and {{item:1001}}  would have been my first back items with also {{item:2043}}  if you can afford it.  
 
    At that point try to farm as best as you can and use the corrupting potion as a heal and not for fighting as stated before they can dash away from you and just kit you(graves).  

  use your second back for these items and to finish the starting items  {{item:1001}}  plus your cloth at start {{item:1029}}  make it into {{item:3047}}   this will HELP against VI and Graves now once you have that item I would recommend start building for the AP MAGE on the ENEMY team {{item:3065}}  helps with your life steal proc as olaf and it gives you 10% cooldown on abilities for olaf and that helps alot.  

  You did build those items for your other games and your doing fine just keep working at it and you will get out of Bronze dude in no time.  
Brosiden Lord of the Brocean  wicked name btw XD  show the enemy why you are a Lord and
      Have a Good One !

Thanks. Yeah once I get in to silver I want to take some time and just improve on all of my skills like builds last hitting and things along those lines. I only had a bad kda because my team didnt have much pressure top so i was 2/2/1 because every time graves would get a gank and kill me he would stay too long so i would tp back and kill him. Then when they started to group and siege thats where my other 2 deaths came from.  Yeah i like corrupting potion for the sustain i feel like i would spend more in potions then just getting that early.  Thanks for the comment :D

NP, also I would recommend going with these Mastery order if you want to scale and be a Full tank later on but helps with surviving the early game 


SAVAGERY
SECRET STASH( that way you get a Cloth Armor and 3 Biscuits that gives mana and HP while having a good starting item) 
( if you are facing Teemo or any top of AP champions I would get this item with the SECRET STASH {{item:1006}} you can get 2 of them and 3 Biscuits that can be turned into alot of MR items.  and it will help with the other Mastery order that I recommend below 

MERCILESS and DANGEROUS GAME are the best Late game team fighting Masteries that you can get while being a Full TANK. 

Unyielding if you want to TP botlane or just get big early or TOUGH SKIN if you think you can sustain and works well again with {{item:1006}} but be mindful that getting the TOUGH SKIN you are a little bit weaker than UNYIELDING and putting alot of faith into your team to not feed until you can sustain long enough to get a few items.  
 
VETERAN'S SCARS same thing its a sustain Mastery and works well with sustain items stated before but I would not get it over RUNIC ARMOR as being a Full tank is much better then being able to just sustain.

LEGENDARY GUARDIAN Is the obvious choice over SWIFTNESS you can buy {{item:3111}} {{item:3009}} for that.  

Keep it up laters Have a Good One !

Thanks M8

I'll add you and spectate when I can but I don't have a lot of time so no promises :(.

Also, while I may consider myself decent at this game, I'm by no means amazing (plat 2) and I do make mistakes all the time so keep that in mind.

Thanks Mate. Yeah but everyone besides faker makes mistakes and even then i was watching an old olaf game he did and he missed a ton of axes lol :P

only way to exit bronze is to carry every match.
this is why bronze support is a painful position.

yeah i got down to bronze 5 one faithful day i had off of school and im like lets queue up for support and top lane.... and the rest well that is history. I climbed back up tho with olaf top and jungle. Top mostly.
